name: Signature field for Elementor Forms
author: add-ons.org

sections.description:
DEMO: https://demo.add-ons.org/demo-repeater-fields/

Elementor Form Signature field add-on makes it easy for users to sign your forms. Signatures can be captured and displayed in your emails and saved to your submitted form data be viewed in your backend.

It supports all modern browsers and touch based devices.

Features

  • Easy to use
  • Touchscreen and Mouse Support: Ensure compatibility across various devices, allowing users to sign using touchscreen devices or a mouse..
  • Customizable Signature Field: Customize the signature field appearance (color, background, width, and height) to align with your website’s design.
  • Seamless Signature Integration: Integrate a signature field seamlessly into your Elementor forms, allowing users to sign directly on your website..
  • Conditional Logic support: The field conditional Logic support
  • Entry and print preview support
  • Pdf Support You can add signature to pdf

Pro Version

  • Change background and color
  • Add your full name at the end of the signature
  • 30-day money-back guarantee
  • 1-year support

Download Pro Version: https://add-ons.org/plugin/gravity-forms-repeater-fields/
sections.installation:
Normal installation

  1. Download the repeater-field-for-Elementor-Forms.zip file to your computer.
  2. Unzip the file.
  3. Upload the repeater-field-for-Elementor-Forms directory to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  5. Document: https://add-ons.org/document-elementor-forms-signature/
